ScoreBossAbility.100001.2:
The boss starts with 1 stack of Berserk and gains 1 stack every 10s (up to 5 stacks). Each stack increases the boss' DMG by <color=#ec6d21>&Param1&</color>.
Dealing 10 hits to the boss within 2s removes all Berserk stacks. The main Trekker then gains 10 stacks of Amplify (up to 10 stacks). Each hit dealt consumes 1 Amplify stack to increase that hit's DMG by <color=#ec6d21>&Param2&</color>.
ScoreBossAbility.100002.2:
The boss gains a Fire Ring, increasing their DMG dealt by <color=#ec6d21>&Param1&</color> and continuously dealing DMG to your squad within the ring.
Triggering 3 Elemental Marks on the boss within 5s grants the squad Enhancement, increasing Auto Attack DMG by <color=#ec6d21>&Param2&</color> for 10s, and disables the boss's Fire Ring for 10s.
ScoreBossAbility.100003.2:
The boss gains 1 stack of Battle Frenzy every 5 seconds, increasing the DMG it deals by <color=#ec6d21>&Param1&</color> (up to 5 stacks).
When the Main Trekker triggers a Mark, removes 1 stack of Battle Frenzy from the boss. Successfully removing a stack of Battle Frenzy restores 20 Energy for the squad, and increases the boss's Ultimate DMG Taken by <color=#ec6d21>&Param2&</color>, lasting for 10s and resets when triggered again.
ScoreBossAbility.100004.2:
When the boss possesses Dark Ring, its DMG increases by <color=#ec6d21>&Param1&</color>, and it deals an additional AoE DMG every 5s.
Dealing 20 hits to the boss within 3s disables the boss's Dark Ring for 15s. The boss also takes <color=#ec6d21>&Param2&</color> more Skill DMG dealt by Support Trekkers during this period.
ScoreBossAbility.100005.2:
The boss shifts between Illusion Form and Reality Form every <color=#ec6d21>15s</color>.
In Reality Form, the boss takes <color=#ec6d21>&Param1&</color> more Minion DMG. Triggering a mark increases the current form's duration by <color=#ec6d21>&Param2&</color>s. It can only be triggered once per sec.
In Illusion Form, the boss takes <color=#ec6d21>&Param3&</color> increased Skill DMG. Dealing Minion DMG each time increases the current form's duration by <color=#ec6d21>&Param4&</color>s. It can only be triggered once per sec.
ScoreBossAbility.100006.2:
When the boss has Thunderbolt, its DMG is increased by <color=#ec6d21>&Param4&</color> and deals additional DMG in a small area 4 times every 3s.
Dealing Support Skill DMG <color=#ec6d21>&Param2&</color> times to the boss within <color=#ec6d21>&Param1&</color>s disables Thunderbolt for 15s, and increases the Skill DMG the boss takes from Support Trekkers by <color=#ec6d21>&Param3&</color> for the duration.
